reviewText: This is typical Land Before Time and I wouldn't change a thing.  A simple childrens plot, music and familiar characters with a couple of new ones.  My child has been watching Land before Time since she was old enough to remember.  She love's this one and everyone that came before.  Some she likes more than others, but she loves them all.  It's the adventures of Little Foot, Cera, Ducky, Spike & Petrie, what more could you ask for.  There's nothing better than snuggling up and watching their next big adventure.  I would recommend this movie highly...It's exactly what we've come to expect from a familiar set of friends.

My boys (4 and 2 years old) LOVE this movie!!! It's totally worth purchasing. I can't even say how many times we've watched it since our purchase last month! I bought it to play at the boys dinosaur birthday party and the kids all loved it. There are no hugely scary scenes and the songs are wonderful. The boys love to sing-along.  This is the first Land Before Time movie we've seen, but you don't need to have seen the others to enjoy it. Recommend highly!

I have two boys who absolutely love the Land Before Time movies. While I do agree with other reviews about the first one being the best, this one is also a favorite in our home. My kids and I searched five different stores for this movie and couldn't find it, so I decided to go online. I really appreciate the people who take the time to write reviews on here for products. I find them to be very helpful. I spent quite a while reading reviews for the other Land Before Time movies on here. I was impressed with the reviews for this one, and ended up purchasing (V) The Mysterious Island as well. We love them both!

I had looked everywhere for this movie, I could find them all but this one. My grandson loves the littlefoot movies and this was the only one we did not have. It came earlier than expected and in mint condition.
This whole set of movies are great. The grand kids love them, but we love them too!

I'm tickled pink for purchasing this movie. The Land Before Time is a movie my sister and I remember growing up on. Now there's the chance for my son to enjoy the original and all the new Land Before Time movies as well. He absolutely loves them. I'll be purchasing more for him to start a collection.
The movie is really cute and fun for the kids.  They love the music and all the friendly characters.

The newest installment has the lovable dinos meeting a new and unique creature named Guido.  Guido has no memories of who or what he is other than his name.  It is up to Littlefoot and the gang to help Guido find his place in the world.  Petrie has the most to gain from associating with Guido because like Guido he is having a hard time fitting in with the other flyers.  Petrie is having trouble getting ready for the day of the flyers (his rite of passage to become an adult) because he must learn to fly in formation with his siblings.  However, he is only good at flying when alone.  The whole premis of the movie is that Guido and Petrie learn that it is OK to be different and to accept who you are.
All the "land Before Time movies are great for kids and I don't mind watching them with my granddaughter. I wonder how many of them there are?
Took a little longer to recieve than expected, but still was in a timely fashion

An excellent addition to the the Land Before Time series. We have them all, and I enjoy watching them with my grandson. These movies are so good for children,as they offer valuable life lessons along with an excellent story.
The land before time movie series is the best. This is another excellent addition to these movies. I love them and my daughter especially loves them. I recommend the whole set.

I've seen a couple of the Land Before Time movies in years past. I don't have children so I've never purchased one... until now. I watched part of the "Great Day" at a friend's home. It was wonderful!

I enjoyed seeing how the real-life challenges were overcome, e.g., Sera's dealing w/ the new one. The youngster I was watching with wanted to go to to the beginning (since you can't rewind a DVD). Inside I was "up in arms" because I wanted to see the entire movie. So I decided I needed to buy my own copy. And I'll share it w/ some other young ones... & not-so-young... because it's a beautiful story.
The best product ever!

My son has an obsession with dinosaurs, so when he saw this one as a preview on his old Curious George DVD I got him, I just knew he needed this movie. While waiting for this DVD to arrive I rented a different Land Before Time movie which he wasn't majorly into, so that made me a bit nervous. But this one, he really loves! The songs in it are just wonderful and he enjoys dancing along to them. And after only watching it for 2 days he's already learning the names of the characters...and he's not even 3 yet! So glad I decided to get this one for him. Maybe now he'll be more interested in the others, too. I love bringing a part of my childhood to him, sharing a common interest!
